channel.title: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)
channel.description:
[center][url=http://rscrival.com/][img]http://rscrival.com/images/bx.png[/img][/url][/center]
Rsc Rival is a server designed to try and bring back the thrill of old school PK/Dueling with updates that add new content, rates that allow for fairly easy skill training, but still give the accomplishment of gaining the max level in a skill. It is fairly easy to gain Vanilla RSC items, but quite difficult to collect the new weapon and armor sets, making them valuable risks if you dare take them into the wilderness, or stake them in a duel.
There are Custom weapons, armor, food items, herbs, gems, wood, maps, arrows, ores, skills, and many more to come. You may recognize many features of the old server, I hope in time things will build from what has already been added to the source, current plans are adding pets, an auction house, and a 'bounty' system that will grant bonuses for killing a player target. Other future updates include 'barrows' minigame, key collection minigames, possibly new skills, clue scrolls, a custom wilderness island, and many more.
Images:[url=http://imgur.com/a/PeHhb#0] (Far too many things to screenshot, check ingame for yourself.)[/url]
Few highlights: New Potions: [img]http://i.imgur.com/SrAWRjl.png[/img]
New Areas: [img]http://i.imgur.com/HYM2rIF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UowhVaN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/suSGnUX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sniBJoG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2Bcigv7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1YTbKV1.png[/img]
Event Rewards: [img]http://i.imgur.com/RpLAyXN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1caVswL.png[/img]
Dropparty hall and event island: [img]http://i.imgur.com/xi8DYLZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HkuvbEs.png[/img]
Website: [url=http://rscrival.com/]RSC Rival[/url]
Note: This isn't a clone/theft server, I did a fair proportion of the new content that was developed for this source, and plan to add more features and content in the future. I have permission from the previous owner to continue the project since he has a life now and doesn't have time to code for RSC.
Since Virtually No-one posts or views this forum anymore, I highly encourage you to tell your friends to give the server a try.
Edit:
New Minigame
Kill all 8 NPCs, loot the chest, get a random assortment of CRAP! big_smile
Platform Fisherman: Red Key Rowdy Guard: Orange Key Viyeldi: Yellow Key General Khazard: Blue Key Rock of Ages: Magenta Key Black Knight Titan: Black Key Black Demon: Bronze Key Nezikchened: Bone Key
Collect all 8, loot the chest at the end, and get an assortment of treasure.
Possible loot includes: Runes Arrows Rune armor & Weapons Coins Rune mask

[quote=“l0w archer, post:18, topic:551651”][quote author=KizL link=topic=670566.msg4484143#msg4484143 date=1432752938]
Might as well ::setstat the fudge have x100 for? Waste of time.
[/quote]

Just because you’re still longing for that x1 rsc replica that does not mean other servers that don’t follow suit are a waste of time lad… some people just want a bit of fun and know this aint going to last forever[/quote]
I’m not longing for shit. x10 is perfect anything higher is fudgeing retarded.

I give this server a month max. rofl peace

p.s. OP can’t even spell.

~K!zL

item.source: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)

item.title: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)
item.dc:creator: @hornyhamster hornyhamster
item.description:
@hornyhamster wrote:

The server isn’t a slow xp grind, most of the servers that are sell subscriptions to give higher xp rates. We have stats over 99, so the XP rates needed to rise, otherwise 30/40 would have been perfect for maxing skills.

There is no subscriber status atm, if we did add sub in the future it would be a negligible difference, (maybe 110/130 for combat/skilling instead of 100/120) The only time we’d add sub is if the server grew too large for the current host, and we’d need to upgrade.

We’re still making small, daily tweaks, fixing issues, working on new content. The server is designed for having fun, not making money.

Read full topic
item.source: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)

item.title: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)
item.dc:creator: @Tomorroww Tomorroww
item.description:
@Tomorroww wrote:

Been steady playing this since I’ve always been big on reloaded, glad it’s back good server

If I recall original reloaded was even higher rates, it’s fine the way it is don’t listen to the no life low xp nerds that want to grind nonstop for months on end. Even at 100x rates 120 is going to take a while when you can’t be on 24/7.

Read full topic
item.source: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)

item.title: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)
item.dc:creator: @hornyhamster hornyhamster
item.description:
@hornyhamster wrote:

120 max stat requires over 100m exp.

Try getting 120 prayer, or firemaking, then tell me the exp rate is too high.

There are separate rates for combat and skilling too, might end up being 120x skilling 80x combat, since you can afk train most combat skills. (magic and range being the exception)

Slowly raising it till the rates seem right, it shouldnt take a month to get 120, but it shouldnt take a day either.

Read full topic

item.title: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)
item.dc:creator: @Jauro Jauro
item.description:
@Jauro wrote:

[quote=“hornyhamster, post:13, topic:551651”]Gonna at least double rates, now that we changed max lvl.

You can get rune and dragon in a day for pking 99 flats in 1-3 days, will be less once we increase exp rates, working on finding a good balance.

This isnt a ‘kill 3 red dragons and get a dragon axe’ ‘max stats in an hour’ server, and it isnt a ‘grind day and night’ replica server. It’s somewhere in between, you will need to earn the custom drops, I believe the first hallow item was obtained around 48 hours after launch (with 50+ accounts trying to get items) so if you get a rare drop it will feel like an accomplishment, not just ‘Oo another axe’ Exp rates will probably wind up being around 100x in wild now, and it should be changed with the next update

P.S. People keep asking, I’m not Keith, I’m not Mark, I’m not Kurupt, I’m Sephiroth/Ibcrootbeer, the invisible one noone remembers :D[/quote]
i do remember you, dont just remember where from lol.

Read full topic
item.source: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)

item.title: RscRival (Custom this, Custom that, Fun PK/Economy server)

@hornyhamster wrote:

Gonna at least double rates, now that we changed max lvl.

You can get rune and dragon in a day for pking 99 flats in 1-3 days, will be less once we increase exp rates, working on finding a good balance.

This isnt a ‘kill 3 red dragons and get a dragon axe’ ‘max stats in an hour’ server, and it isnt a ‘grind day and night’ replica server. It’s somewhere in between, you will need to earn the custom drops, I believe the first hallow item was obtained around 48 hours after launch (with 50+ accounts trying to get items) so if you get a rare drop it will feel like an accomplishment, not just ‘Oo another axe’ Exp rates will probably wind up being around 100x in wild now, and it should be changed with the next update

P.S. People keep asking, I’m not Keith, I’m not Mark, I’m not Kurupt, I’m Sephiroth/Ibcrootbeer, the invisible one noone remembers

no mark, no keith, atm it’s just me (Sephiroth/Ibcrootbeer) and someone I know from RS2 servers. I’m the owner now and hes helping with the server and some coding, so things actually get done for once x3

It is the source from RSCR which I made a ton of stuff for (maps/items/npcs) First step is implementing all the stuff I made, but the previous owner(s) never added
